Singapore Hosting from JustVPS Start at $2.52/mo for WordPress or $3.68 for KVM (1st Month)!

justvps, kvm, lion city, singapore, wordpress April 13, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

JustVPS is new to LEB and this is their first offer.  They’re offering VMs and WordPress hosting in Singapore.  That’s a less common hosting location than the major geographies (SF Bay, NYC, Dallas, Netherlands, London, etc.) and their offers are…well, just!

  • 1GB RAM VM with 25GB disk/1TB transfer starting at $3.68/mo (first month, then $4.90/mo)
  • Or up that to  2GB RAM and double the disk for $5.93/mo (first month, then $7.90/mo)
  • Or if you want to host WordPress but not get into the details of managing it yourself, check out their WordPress hosting at only $2.52/mo or $25.20/year

If you’re looking for Singapore-based hosting, check out their Looking Glass below and decide if JustVPS is right for you.  They are registered in the Lion City itself (Singapore, as Virtual Electronics PTE, 01918829E). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept Visa/Mastercard, PayPal, Crypto, AliPay.

Here’s a little about JustVPS in their own words:

“We implement powerful Cloud Hosting solutions to help you develop and manage your projects. With our Cloud VPS solutions, you can utilize maximum server power and smartly allocate available resources to fit any growth. Let’s take a closer look at the advantages of Just Cloud VPS.

Total scalability – We simplify things for you to focus on what matters most. Just Cloud VPS is designed to support your projects with maximum scalability. Scale up or down whenever you need it and manage your budget with ease.

99.999% uptime – Just Cloud VPS is much more reliable than a regular VPS. With Just Cloud VPS, Compute Nodes form a core of resources within a cloud environment. Even if one of the Compute Nodes fails, your Just Cloud VPS is instantly recreated on another

Cloud Compute Node – This will happen so quickly that you won’t even notice. And this lets us achieve 99.999% uptime.

Powered by OpenNebula – OpenNebula is a powerful and easy to use open source Cloud Management Platform. Enjoy flexibility, simplicity and scalability.”

If you have been a customer of JustVPS or you give them a try out now, please comment below.
